info.title: Security Insights
info.description: API spec for Microsoft.SecurityInsights (Azure Security Insights) resource provider

get.description: Lists all operations available Azure Security Insights Resource Provider.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates the alert rule.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets all actions of alert rule.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

operationsList.description: Lists the operations available in the SecurityInsights RP.

nextLink.description: URL to fetch the next set of operations.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

nextLink.description: URL to fetch the next set of alert rules.

AlertRuleKind.description: Describes an Azure resource with kind.

kind.description: The kind of the alert rule

displayName.description: The display name for alerts created by this alert rule.

description.description: The description of the alert rule.

severity.description: The severity for alerts created by this alert rule.

enabled.description: Determines whether this alert rule is enabled or disabled.

query.description: The query that creates alerts for this rule.

queryFrequency.description: The frequency (in ISO 8601 duration format) for this alert rule to run.

queryPeriod.description: The period (in ISO 8601 duration format) that this alert rule looks at.

triggerOperator.description: The operation against the threshold that triggers alert rule.

triggerThreshold.description: The threshold triggers this alert rule.

suppressionEnabled.description: Determines whether the suppression for this alert rule is enabled or disabled.

suppressionDuration.description: The suppression (in ISO 8601 duration format) to wait since last time this alert rule been triggered.

lastModifiedUtc.description: The last time that this alert has been modified.

nextLink.description: URL to fetch the next set of actions.

triggerUri.description: The uri for the action to trigger.

nextLink.description: URL to fetch the next set of cases.

Case.description: Represents a case in Azure Security Insights.

lastUpdatedTimeUtc.description: The last time the case was updated

createdTimeUtc.description: The time the case was created

endTimeUtc.description: The end time of the case

startTimeUtc.description: The start time of the case

labels.description: List of labels relevant to this case

assignedTo.description: Describes a user that the case is assigned to

values.description: Case that wasn't promoted yet to active
An active case which isn't handled currently
An active case which is handled

closeReason.description: The reason the case was closed

values.description: Case was closed for another reason

nextLink.description: URL to fetch the next set of cases.

Bookmark.description: Represents a bookmark in Azure Security Insights.

displayName.description: The display name of the bookmark

lastUpdatedTimeUtc.description: The last time the bookmark was updated

createdTimeUtc.description: The time the bookmark was created

createdBy.description: Describes a user that created the bookmark

updatedBy.description: Describes a user that updated the bookmark

labels.description: List of labels relevant to this bookmark

UserInfo.description: User information that made some action

objectId.description: The object id of the user.

Label.description: Label that will be used to tag and filter on.

nextLink.description: URL to fetch the next set of data connectors.

DataConnectorKind.description: Describes an Azure resource with kind.

kind.description: The kind of the data connector

DataConnectorTenantId.description: Properties data connector on tenant level.

tenantId.description: The tenant id to connect to, and get the data from.

dataTypes.description: The available data types for the connector.

OfficeDataConnectorDataTypes.description: The available data types for office data connector.

dataTypes.description: The available data types for the connector.

TIDataConnectorDataTypes.description: The available data types for TI (Threat Intelligence) data connector.

AADDataConnector.description: Represents AAD (Azure Active Directory) data connector.

properties.description: AAD (Azure Active Directory) data connector properties.

AADDataConnectorProperties.description: AAD (Azure Active Directory) data connector properties.

ASCDataConnector.description: Represents ASC (Azure Security Center) data connector.

properties.description: ASC (Azure Security Center) data connector properties.

ASCDataConnectorProperties.description: MCAS (Microsoft Cloud App Security) data connector properties.

subscriptionId.description: The subscription id to connect to, and get the data from.

MCASDataConnector.description: Represents MCAS (Microsoft Cloud App Security) data connector.

properties.description: MCAS (Microsoft Cloud App Security) data connector properties.

MCASDataConnectorProperties.description: MCAS (Microsoft Cloud App Security) data connector properties.

dataTypes.description: The available data types for the connector.

AlertsDataTypeOfDataConnector.description: Alerts data type for data connectors.

DataConnectorDataTypeCommon.description: Common field for data type in data connectors.

state.description: Describe whether this data type connection is enabled or not.

nextLink.description: URL to fetch the next set of entities.

EntityKind.description: Describes an Azure resource with kind.

values.description: Entity represents account in the system.
Entity represents host in the system.
Entity represents file in the system.

accountName.description: The name of the account. This field should hold only the name without any domain added to it, i.e. administrator.

ntDomain.description: The NETBIOS domain name as it appears in the alert format  domain\username. Examples: NT AUTHORITY.

upnSuffix.description: The user principal name suffix for the account, in some cases it is also the domain name. Examples: contoso.com.

sid.description: The account security identifier, e.g. S-1-5-18.

aadTenantId.description: The Azure Active Directory tenant id.

aadUserId.description: The Azure Active Directory user id.

puid.description: The Azure Active Directory Passport User ID.

isDomainJoined.description: Determines whether this is a domain account.

objectGuid.description: The objectGUID attribute is a single-value attribute that is the unique identifier for the object, assigned by active directory.

dnsDomain.description: The DNS domain that this host belongs to. Should contain the compete DNS suffix for the domain

ntDomain.description: The NT domain that this host belongs to.

hostName.description: The hostname without the domain suffix.

azureID.description: The azure resource id of the VM.

omsAgentID.description: The OMS agent id, if the host has OMS agent installed.

osVersion.description: A free text representation of the operating system. This field is meant to hold specific versions the are more fine grained than OSFamily or future values not supported by OSFamily enumeration

isDomainJoined.description: Determines whether this host belongs to a domain.

directory.description: The full path to the file.

fileName.description: The file name without path (some alerts might not include path).

OfficeConsentList.description: List of all the office365 consents.

nextLink.description: URL to fetch the next set of office consents.

OfficeConsent.description: Consent for Office365 tenant that already made.

tenantId.description: The tenantId of the Office365 with the concesnt.

tenantName.description: The tenant name of the Office365 with the concesnt.

SettingsKind.description: Describes an Azure resource with kind.

UebaSettings.description: Represents settings for User and Entity Behavior Analytics enablement.

properties.description: User and Entity Behavior Analytics settings properties

UebaSettingsProperties.description: User and Entity Behavior Analytics settings property bag.

isEnabled.description: Determines whether User and Entity Behavior Analytics is enabled for this workspace.

statusInMcas.description: Determines whether User and Entity Behavior Analytics is enabled from MCAS (Microsoft Cloud App Security).

atpLicenseStatus.description: Determines whether the tenant has ATP (Advanced Threat Protection) license.

isEnabled.description: Determines whether the setting is enable or disabled.

ResourceGroupName.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

OperationalInsightsResourceProvider.name: operationalInsightsResourceProvider
OperationalInsightsResourceProvider.description: The namespace of workspaces resource provider- Microsoft.OperationalInsights.

SettingsName.name: settingsName
SettingsName.description: The setting name. Supports- Fusion, UEBA
